00043     public function TableExists ( $table )
00062     {
00063         if ( $this->database == '' )
00064         // no database selected
00065         {
00066             $errs = new Errors();
00067 
00068             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NO_DB_SELECTED , 'No database selected.' ) );
00069             
00070             return $errs;            
00071         }
00072         else
00073         {
00074                 if ( ( $tableList = & $this->Query( 'SHOW TABLES FROM '.$this->database ) instanceof Errors ) )
00075             // query failed
00076             {
00077                 return $tableList;
00078             }
00079             else
00080             // search for table
00081             {
00082                                 foreach ( $tableList as $currentTable )
00083                                 {
00084                                         if ( $table == $currentTable->GetProperty( 'Tables_in_'.$this->database ) )
00085                     {
00086                         unset ( $tableList );
00087                         return True;
00088                     }
00089                 }
00090                                 
00091                 $errs = new Errors();
00092     
00093                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_TABLE_INEXISTANT , 'This table does not exist.' ) );
00094                 
00095                 return $errs;                 
00096             }
00097         }
00098     } //----- End of TableExists

00212     public function Open( $isPersistent )
00229     {
00230         if ( !$this->isConnected() ) 
00231         {
00232                         if ( $isPersistent == BDDConnection::CONNECTION_PERSISTENT )
00233                         {
00234                                 $connectFunction = 'mysql_pconnect';
00235                         }
00236                         else
00237                         {
00238                                 $connectFunction = 'mysql_connect';
00239                         }
00240                 
00241             if ( ($this->connection = @$connectFunction( $this->server , $this->username , $this->password )) )
00242             {
00243                 return NULL;
00244             }
00245             else
00246             {
00247                 // connexion échouée
00248                 $this->connection = NULL;
00249                 
00250                 $errs = new Errors();
00251     
00252                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CANNOT_OPEN , 'Unable to open connection, please verify your login/password.' ) );
00253                 
00254                 return $errs;
00255             }
00256         }
00257         else
00258         {
00259             $errs = new Errors();
00260 
00261             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_ALREADY_OPENED , 'Connection already opened.' ) );
00262             
00263             return $errs;
00264         }
00265     } //----- End of Open

00267     public function SetDatabase( $database ) 
00268     
00283     {
00284         if ( !$this->isConnected() )
00285         {
00286             // connexion inexistante
00287             $errs = new Errors();
00288 
00289             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CLOSED , 'Connection closed.' ) );
00290             
00291             return $errs;
00292         }
00293         else
00294         {
00295             if ( !@mysql_select_db ( $database , $this->connection ) )
00296             // change échoué
00297             {
00298                 $errs = new Errors();
00299     
00300                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CANNOT_CHANGE_DB , 'Unable to change database : '.mysql_error( $this->connection ) ) );
00301                 
00302                 return $errs;
00303             }
00304             else
00305             {
00306                 $this->database = $database;
00307

00313     public function Query( $query )
00330     {
00331         if ( $this->database == '' )
00332         // no database selected
00333         {
00334             $errs = new Errors();
00335 
00336             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NO_DB_SELECTED , 'Aucune base de données sélectionnée' ) );
00337             
00338             return $errs;            
00339         }
00340         else
00341         {
00342             if ( ( $result = @mysql_query( $query , $this->connection ) ) === false ) 
00343             // query failed
00344             {
00345                 $errs = new Errors();
00346     
00347                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_QUERY_FAILED , 'La requete a échoué ('.$query.') : '.mysql_error( $this->connection ) ) );
00348                 
00349                 return $errs;
00350             }
00351             else
00352             {
00353                 $this->nombreRequetes++;
00354             
00355                                 // set in en BDDRecord
00356                                 
00357                                 $nouvellesRessources = new BDDRecordSet ( );
00358                                 
00359                                 while ( ($row = @mysql_fetch_assoc ( $result ) ) !== false )
00360                                 {
00361                                         $nouvellesRessources->Add ( new BDDRecord ( $row ) ) ;
00362                                 }
00363                                 
00364                                 @mysql_free_result ( $result ); // free memory
00365 
00366                 return $nouvellesRessources ;
00367             }
00368         }
00369     } //----- End of Query

00382     public function Close( )
00393     {
00394         if ( !$this->isConnected() || !@mysql_close( $this->connection ) )
00395         {
00396             // no connection
00397             $errs = new Errors();
00398 
00399             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CLOSED , 'Connection already closed' ) );
00400             
00401             return $errs;
00402         }
00403         else
00404         {
00405             $this->database = '';
00406         
00407             return NULL;
00408         }
00409     } //----- End of Close

00411     public function isConnected ( )
00419     {
00420         return ( $this->connection !== NULL && @mysql_stat ( $this->connection ) !== NULL );
00421     } //----- End of isConnected
